languages.text: "Вы собираетесь перебирать все идеи, которые придут вам в голову? Не лучший способ решить проблему. Я бы посоветовал подумать и собрать больше информации".
"Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? That doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."
languages.original_text: "Вы собираетесь перебирать все идеи, которые придут вам в голову? Не лучший способ решить проблему. Я бы посоветовал подумать и собрать больше информации".

traits.locale_text: "Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? This doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."
"Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? This doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."
"Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? That doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."
"Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? That doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."
"Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? That doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."

languages.text: “你是打算把脑子里冒出的每个想法都说一遍吗？这恐怕并不是最有效的解决方案。我建议你多收集收集信息，然后好好思考一下。”
languages.original_text: "Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? That doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."

traits.locale_text: “你是打算把脑子里冒出的每个想法都说一遍吗？这恐怕并不是最有效的解决方案。我建议你多收集收集信息，然后好好思考一下。”

languages.text: «¿Piensa poner a prueba todas las ideas que se le pasan por la cabeza? Esa no es la mejor solución. Le aconsejo que piense y consiga más información».
languages.original_text: "Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? That doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."

traits.locale_text: «¿Piensa poner a prueba todas las ideas que se le pasan por la cabeza? Esa no es la mejor solución. Le aconsejo que piense y consiga más información».

languages.text: 「頭に浮かんだことを適当に述べ続けるつもりですか？得策とは言えませんね。もう少し情報を集めた上で熟考されたほうがよろしいかと」
languages.original_text: "Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? That doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."

traits.locale_text: 「頭に浮かんだことを適当に述べ続けるつもりですか？得策とは言えませんね。もう少し情報を集めた上で熟考されたほうがよろしいかと」

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr jetzt jede Idee vorbringen, die Euch in den Kopf kommt? Das scheint mir keine optimale Lösung zu sein. Ich würde vorschlagen, zuerst nachzudenken und mehr Informationen zu sammeln."
languages.original_text: "Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? That doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr jetzt jede Idee vorbringen, die Euch in den Kopf kommt? Das scheint mir keine optimale Lösung zu sein. Ich würde vorschlagen, zuerst nachzudenken und mehr Informationen zu sammeln."

languages.text: « Avez-vous l'intention de formuler toutes les idées qui vous passent par la tête ? J'ai connu plus efficace, comme solution. Je vous suggère de prendre le temps de réfléchir et de rassembler plus d'informations. »
languages.original_text: "Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? That doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous l'intention de formuler toutes les idées qui vous passent par la tête ? J'ai connu plus efficace, comme solution. Je vous suggère de prendre le temps de réfléchir et de rassembler plus d'informations. »

languages.text: "Aklınıza gelen her fikri böyle tartışacak mıyız? Daha iyi bir çözüm yolu olmalı. Bence biraz düşünün ve daha fazla bilgi edinmeye bakın."
languages.original_text: "Do you intend to try every idea that pops into your head? That doesn't seem like the best solution. I would suggest doing some thinking and gathering more information."

traits.locale_text: "Aklınıza gelen her fikri deneyecek misiniz? Daha iyi bir çözüm yolu olmalı. Bence biraz düşünün ve daha fazla bilgi edinmeye bakın."
